extension.name: LinearMetrics
extension.description: It allows to model an object that specifies the measurements for widgets whose parents are ZLinear Widgets.

methods.name: BuildProps
methods.description: Returns a new property set containing the previously defined properties.

methods.name: SetBuildInMetrics
methods.description: Changes the measurements configured in the widget.

properties.name: MarginLeft
properties.description:
Specifies the extra space on the left side of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: MarginRight
properties.description:
Specifies the extra space on the right side of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: MarginTop
properties.description:
Specifies the extra space on the top side of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: MarginBottom
properties.description:
Specifies the extra space on the bottom side of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Margin
properties.description:
Specifies the extra space for all sides of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>It should be used when all the extra spaces should be the same.
>Replaces all independent margin values.

properties.name: Width
properties.description:
Specifies the width of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: Height
properties.description:
Specifies the height of the widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: ForceSpace
properties.description:
Specifies whether the widget should forcibly occupy a space in its parent widget.
**Block Types:** *Write*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*
**Info:**
>It can be used when all widgets need to occupy the same space or share space equally regardless of their width or height.

properties.name: FillParent
properties.description:
A value that specifies that the widget will occupy all the space in its parent widget.
**Block Types:** *Read*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

properties.name: FillAutomatic
properties.description:
A value that specifies that the widget will occupy only the space that it needs.
**Block Types:** *Read*
**Presentation:** *Blocks*

group.title: Fancy RecyclerView Widgets
group.description: This extension contains a set of components that can be added when creating a RecyclerView.
